short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Elevate your Medium experience with our Chrome Extension, offering a comprehensive overview of your reach and article statistics…

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Elevate your Medium experience with our Chrome Extension, offering a comprehensive overview of your reach and article statistics with just one click!

📊 Gain insights into your total Medium reach, article performance, and response statistics effortlessly.
🚀 Experience the power of Medium Stats, including detailed summaries and customizable views.
💡 Want to support our work? Buying us a coffee - https://www.buymeacoffee.com/programmergirl

✨ Key Features:
📦 Convenient extension popup on the Chrome Toolbar for easy access to essential stats and milestones.
📈 Visualize your progress with bar charts and markers, plus easily track claps per article and per fan.

⚠️ Please note: 
To utilize this extension, ensure you're logged into your Medium account.
The current version considers only articles from the last 90 days.

🛠️ CHANGELOG
0.5.0 Add Notifications tab; Fix home page stats (extended table); Updated invites to join our publication
0.4.0 Engagement Charts: Clappers, Followers, Responders, Member Reads/Views. Available only for M. Stats💚 Publication
0.3.0 Tools section - Capitalize The Title
0.2.0 Articles counter, details for selected date range (income, views/reads)
0.1.1 Dates range selector, New branding Logo, Cache 3 hours
0.0.1 Initial Release
